title: The Simple Yet Precise Legacy of Carril’s Princeton Offense
description: Carril, who died this week at 92, built teams that stymied bigger powerhouses during the games that mattered each March.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:credit: Aaron Houston for The New York Times
media:description: Pete Carril’s teams won 13 league titles and an N.I.T. championship in 1975.
